main.name: Gared Barney
main.description: I am a passion driven developer that loves to see how far I can push the limits of creativity and technology.
main.bio: Passionate lifelong gamer and lover of tech that wanted to push my creative side with developing code. My leadership skills and drive to always be the best in both personal and professional settings has given me the skills to overcome every obstacle I come across. Since graduating from General Assembly, I have grown my skills with Javascript, Express, Python, C++, and more, as well as continue to push my desire for learning and bettering my skills. I am a strong team member that strives to build websites and apps that others and I can enjoy, all the while building it as efficiently and user friendly as possible.
main.contactmessage: Please contact me if you would like to contract me for work or have any questions

education.description: An intensive, twelve-week, 480+ hour software engineering immersive program teaching full-stack application development with object-oriented programming, MVC frameworks, and SQL and NoSQL database programs.

work.title: Fire Inspector
work.description: Worked with building owners and inspected commercial fire alarm and security systems to make sure they were up to code. Fixed any bugs in system, as well as replaced hardware as needed.

work.title: Roofing Lead
work.description: Worked with company owner to design saftey procedures, bid jobs, and install new as well as repair old roofing systems.

projects.title: Going for Gold
projects.category: Small dungeon crawler created in Phaser and Javascript

projects.title: MMO-Flash
projects.category: MMO news site with a discussion board and authorization for user access

projects.title: Game Launch
projects.category: Social gaming and rating site I made with 2 other developers using MERN stack

testimonials.text: As I complete more freelance work, my testimonials will go here
